gui.vampirism.reset_skills.desc: 重設技能後你將會降低一級。還要繼續嗎？
gui.vampirism.reset_skills.desc_test: 你真的希望重設技能？（你的等級將不會被降低，因為你正在使用吸血鬼模組的Alpha版本）
gui.vampirism.name_sword.title: 武器名字
gui.vampirism.name_sword.text: 你要給這把劍取個名字嗎？
gui.vampirism.taskmaster.text.vampirism_: Sire, if you are willing to help the local vampire community, there are several tasks you can complete. You will be rewarded upon completion and make yourself a name. Please browse the available task and accept any you like

Fellow hunter,
to support the local hunter community, there are several tasks you can complete. You will be rewarded upon completion. Please browse the available tasks and accept any you like.
Make your crossbow sometimes not consume an arrow when shooting. Chance increases with level
enchantment.vampirism.vampireslayer.desc: Increase damage dealt to vampiric creatures
enchantment.vampirism.crossbowinfinite.d: Makes your (non tech) crossbow shoot without consuming arrows

text.vampirism.vampire_villager.trade_su: 謝謝你把我們從吸血鬼獵人那裡救出來

text.vampirism.title: Title
text.vampirism.can_only_be_used_by_level: 它只能被%s玩家使用且需達到%s級或更高
text.vampirism.med_chair_other_faction: 你已經是%s了，不能成為吸血鬼獵人
text.vampirism.can_only_be_used_with_ski: 它只能透過使用 %s 技能來使用
text.vampirism.basic_hunter.pay_n_vampir: 為了訓練你，請支付%s瓶吸血鬼之血
text.vampirism.basic_hunter.i_will_train: 好的，我將盡我所能訓練你
text.vampirism.basic_hunter.minion.avail: I would love to work for such a reputable vampire hunter as you are
text.vampirism.basic_hunter.minion.start: Thank you for the equipment, I will serve you now and do as you command
text.vampirism.basic_hunter.minion.no_fr: However, I think you are not experienced enough to command an additional hunter
text.vampirism.basic_hunter.minion.requi: If you provide me with proper equipment, in form of a %s item, I will work for you
text.vampirism.basic_hunter.minion.unava: You seem to be a reputable vampire hunter, but I do no like serving someone other than myself
text.vampirism.basic_vampire.minion.unav: This vampire is too strong to bind to you
text.vampirism.basic_vampire.minion.avai: This vampire can be bound to you making it your minion
text.vampirism.basic_vampire.minion.no_f: You are not able to control more minions
text.vampirism.basic_vampire.minion.star: You appear to be someone of great value, I shall endeavor with you my lord.
It's indeed an Honour to be sired to one such as yourself!
I appreciate your kindness and hospitality, I shall serve for you Sire.
text.vampirism.basic_vampire.minion.requ: You need a %s to bind this vampire to you
text.vampirism.task.reward_obtain: Can be obtained as a task reward from a %s
text.vampirism.skill.level_to_low: 你的吸血鬼等級對於它來說太低了
text.vampirism.ritual_requirements_not_m: 你還沒有完全發現這個儀式所需的物品
text.vampirism.ritual_no_vampire: 你需要成為吸血鬼才能進行該儀式
text.vampirism.cant_fly_umbrella: You cannot fly with an umbrella equipped
text.vampirism.cant_fly_garlic: 你不能在大蒜的影響下飛行
text.vampirism.cant_fly_end: You are not able to transform into a bat in the End
text.vampirism.no_more_minions: 你無法控制更多的僕從了
text.vampirism.coffin.no_sleep: You can only sleep during day
text.vampirism.coffin.too_far_away: You may not rest now; the coffin is too far away
text.vampirism.tent.no_sleep: You can sleep only at night and during thunderstorms
text.vampirism.tent.too_far_away: You may not rest now; the tent is too far away
text.vampirism.tent.cant_use: You can’t sleep in a tent
text.vampirism.no_control_minion: 你還不能控制這個僕從
text.vampirism.need_empty_bottle: 親王，我需要空瓶以收集血液
text.vampirism.sorry_i_died_while_doing: 親王，對不起，我在完成您的託付時死亡了
text.vampirism.lord.other_player_become: 挑戰並取代了先前的吸血鬼親王
text.vampirism.lord.vampire_replace: 另一玩家奪走了你的吸血鬼親王之位
text.vampirism.lord.vampire_kill_replace: 另一吸血鬼殺死你並奪走了吸血鬼親王之位
text.vampirism.lord.new_lord_castle: 新的吸血鬼親王已經誕生並遷入城堡
text.vampirism.lord.vampire_replace_abse: 另一吸血鬼在您缺席時取代了您的吸血鬼親王之位
text.vampirism.lord.portal_disabled: 此門並不會將你帶到任何地方
text.vampirism.lord.level_to_low: 你當前的吸血鬼等級太低了，還難以成為吸血鬼親王
text.vampirism.guard_stay_away_level_low: Your vampire level is too low to travel to Dracula’s castle. Stay away\!
text.vampirism.coffin.wrong_dimension: 你不能在這個維度睡覺。
text.vampirism.deactivated_by_serveradmi: This is deactivated by your server admin
text.vampirism.castle_fail: 沒有找到生成吸血鬼城堡的合適區域。我們推薦你重新創建一個新世界。但也可嘗試輸入"/vampirism checkForVampireBiome"，如果找不到合適的生態域，那就有可能是其他模組干擾的結果。
text.vampirism.no_dracula_to_call: 德古拉已死，你不能呼叫它
text.vampirism.garlic_weapons: 這把武器沾滿了大蒜和毒死吸血鬼的藥物。/n但大蒜已被耗盡。
text.vampirism.outdated: 當前正在運行的吸血鬼模組的版本為%s，最新版本為%s。
text.vampirism.action.disallowed: You cannot use this action here and now
text.vampirism.deals_more_damage_to: 能造成百分之%s的額外傷害，此效果只生效於
text.vampirism.guideapi_available.first: To get a GuideBook for Vampirism install GuideAPI-VP
text.vampirism.guideapi_available.downlo: Click here to go to the mod page
text.vampirism.integrations_available.fi: 這裡有一個用於吸血鬼模組的集成模組，它能為下列已安裝的模組提供更好的相容性：
text.vampirism.integrations_available.do: Click here to go to the mod page
text.vampirism.trainer_disabled_hunter: 在這裡訓練你是不安全的。請解放村莊。
text.vampirism.hunter.cured_sanguinare: You have come to the right person. I have cured you of sanguinare
text.vampirism.hunter_minion.equipment_u: Thank you for the upgraded equipment. Please choose in which area I should train.
text.vampirism.vampire_minion.binding_up: I am grateful for the upgrade, I shall serve you even better now Sire. Please choose in which area I should improve
text.vampirism.vampire_minion.binding_wr: This upgrade is of no help for me
text.vampirism.taskmaster.no_tasks: No tasks available at the moment
text.vampirism.warning_optifine_bloodvis: You appear to be running Optifine with shaders. Blood vision won't work with that. Therefore a substitute glowing effect is used. Not all shaders actually render the glowing effect though.
category.vampirism.balance.tooltip: 修改關於平衡的幾乎全部內容
category.vampirism.balance_mob_prop.tool: 改變吸血鬼生物的特性
category.vampirism.balance_village.toolt: 改變巡邏的獵人在村莊的行為並調整村莊相關的其它內容
category.vampirism.disable.tooltip: 停用模組的部分內容（不推薦）
category.vampirism.village.tooltip: 設置吸血鬼模組對於村莊的變更
action.vampirism.bat.desc: Turn into a bat and fly away
action.vampirism.regen.desc: Temporarily regenerate health faster but use more blood
action.vampirism.summon_bat.desc: Summon a bat swarm around you that blinds any player that touches it
action.vampirism.teleport.desc: Quickly teleport to the spot you are looking at
action.vampirism.vampire_rage.desc: In rage mode you are much faster and deal more damage but consume more blood
action.vampirism.disguise_vampire.desc: Temporarily disguise as a non vampire to trick mobs and players
action.vampirism.disguise_hunter.desc: Temporarily significantly reduce your detection and visibility radius towards mobs and players.
action.vampirism.dark_blood_projectile.d: Fire a blood projectile that deals damage
action.vampirism.half_invulnerable.desc: Action which blocks large damages but slows you down
action.vampirism.awareness_hunter.desc: Action to sense nearby vampire players or entities
action.vampirism.potion_resistance_hunte: Remove certain negative potion effects applied to you
skill.vampirism.stake2: How to actually use a stake
skill.vampirism.blood_vision.desc: Allows you to see entities through walls in the dark. Toggle with key.
skill.vampirism.blood_vision_garlic.desc: Additionally identify entities with poisonous blood
skill.vampirism.advanced_biter.desc: Allows you to suck blood more efficiently and stop at the right moment. Also increases your bite damage.
skill.vampirism.vampire_forest_fog.desc: Increase the fog distance in the Vampire Forest
skill.vampirism.water_resistance.desc: Your body will not be weakened by water anymore
skill.vampirism.blood_charge.desc: Charge your blood using tools on the go by sneak right clicking.
skill.vampirism.sword_finisher.desc: Instantly kill any non vampire that has below %s percent of his max health using a vampire sword
skill.vampirism.half_invulnerable.desc: Action that temporarily blocks high value damages but consumes blood for that
skill.vampirism.vampire_rage.desc: Action that gives you a speed and damage boost on cost of increased blood usage
skill.vampirism.summon_bats.desc: Summon a lot of bats around you while in bat mode to distract enemies
skill.vampirism.sunscreen.desc: Grants temporary immunity from direct sundamage. Has a long cooldown.
skill.vampirism.garlic_blood_vision.desc: Allows you to additionally detect entities with poisonous blood
skill.vampirism.enhanced_armor.desc: Unlock crafting enhanced versions of hunter armors
skill.vampirism.hunter_attack_speed_adva: Reduce your attack cooldown even further
skill.vampirism.weapon_table.desc: Learn how to use the Hunter Weapon Table
skill.vampirism.enhanced_crossbow.desc: Learn how to enhance your crossbows
skill.vampirism.hunter_advanced_attack_s: Increase your attack speed even more
skill.vampirism.stake1.desc: Instantly kill any vampire that has below %s percent of his max health with a stake
skill.vampirism.stake2.desc_all: Instantly kill any vampire from behind with a stake as long as his max health is below %s
skill.vampirism.stake2.desc_npc: Instantly kill any vampire NPC from behind with a stake as long as his max health is below %s
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_table.desc: Learn how to use the Blood Potion Table to create potions from vampire blood
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_good_or_bad: Find out how many bad effects your blood potions have
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_less_bad.de: Lower the chance of getting bad effects
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_category_hi: Get a hint what your extra item might effect
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_duration.de: Your body response better to the potions which makes them operate longer
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_portable_cr: Learn how to brew blood potions without a Blood Potion Table
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_identify_so: Get to know some of the effects of a blood potion
skill.vampirism.tech_weapons.desc: Learn how to build some advanced weapons
skill.vampirism.disguise_hunter.desc: Allows you to hide from mobs and become far less visible to other players
skill.vampirism.basic_alchemy.desc: Learn how to use the Alchemical Cauldron to craft awesome things.
skill.vampirism.garlic_beacon.desc: Learn how to craft a garlic diffuser to keep those vampires away.
skill.vampirism.purified_garlic.desc: Purify your garlic to increase its effect. Boost your garlic diffusor with it.
skill.vampirism.holy_water_enhanced.desc: Create enhanced Holy Water instead of normal one.
skill.vampirism.garlic_beacon_improved.d: Learn how to craft a garlic diffuser with a higher range
skill.vampirism.multitask_brewing.desc: Brew 5 instead of 3 potions with the potion table at once
skill.vampirism.durable_brewing.desc: Learn expensive recipes to brew very long lasting potions
skill.vampirism.concentrated_brewing.des: Learn expensive recipes to brew very strong potions
skill.vampirism.concentrated_durable_bre: Long and Strong is finally possible
text.vampirism.hunter_trainer.trainer_le: I don’t train hunters as inexperienced as you are. Look for someone less experienced
I cannot teach you anything new

block.vampirism.castle_block.vampire_spa: Only vampires can spawn on this

text.vampirism.name: Name:
